Items.Name: Robotic Solutions Australia
Items.Description:
Welcome to Robotic Solutions WA Pty Ltd.  Robotic Solutions WA spcialises in 
robotic automation systems for all industries and can provide robot based 
automated solutions for palletising, materials handling, assembly, welding, 
painting and inspection.  With in-house design, engineering, manufacturing and 
testing facilities, Robotic Solutions WA can design, build, install and service 
a robotic system to suit your application.  Robotic Solutions WA is a 
recognised ABB Robotics Partner and can provide all the necessary training, 
technical support and after sales service for your system.  All systems are 
designed and installed to Australian Standard 2939 "Industrial Robot Systems - 
Safe Design and Usage".  If you require more information or an obligation free 
quotation please don't hesitate to contact us.

Items.Name: Robotics & Drives Services Ltd
Items.Description:
As a systems integrator capable of supplying large turnkey automation projects 
Robotics & Drives is expert in the areas of robotic, electrical, pneumatic, 
hydraulic and safety systems. When supplying a turnkey package our goal is to 
supply a robust and reliable solution that meets the customer's requirements. 
This can only be achieved when the system is based on quality products.

Robotics & Drives prides itself on offering a value-added service which means 
advice, recommendations and technical support on all products from robotics to 
relays.

Items.Name: robot-machining GmbH
Items.Description:
he product has to be perfect

Because that's what counts in the end. This is our experience. Reference 
machines have been working for years in multiple shifts to the complete 
satisfaction of the customer. The requirements may be others again and again, 
but we meet them one hundred percent. That is our philosophy. And we're

Customer-oriented system concepts
Ease of maintenance, accessibility, freedom from wear - factors that determine

Our innovative solutions for the machining of a product resulting from aluminum 
to steel - foundries, automotive, aerospace as well as for the versatile

Everything here is designed to secure his best results to each customer - and 
in the long term. We bring precision and maximum efficiency to a common

Items.Name: Robotteknik Swe AB
Items.Description:
Streamline production with Robotics!

Automation in the plastics, metal casting and wood
Streamline production quickly and easily! In robotics, we have the solutions. 
Our goal is to provide our customers with good service and high availability 
automation equipment. We work preferably with ABB robots. Robotics has over 17 
years experience working on automation in the industry. We hope that with our 
experience to create satisfactory solutions for your production.

New and proven technologies for the automation of your industry. In robotics, 
we use both proven and new breakthrough technology in our automation projects 
for the industry. Most importantly, the reliability and ease of use for you as 
a customer.

Items.Name: Rorick Elektriska Verkstad AB
Items.Description:
Rörick Elektriska Verkstad AB är en komplett leverantör av elektromekanisk 
service som arbetar med alla typer av elektriska motorer, generatorer, transformatorer, pumpar, fläktar, kompressorer, kulskruvar, spindelmotorer mm. När det gäller elmotorer har 
vi en lång erfarenhet av såväl trefasmotorer som likströmsmotorer, samt är 
dessutom Nordens ledande fristående serviceföretag när det gäller servomotorer.

Rörick utför allt från drivlineanalys och anläggningsoptimering till reparation 
och andra underhållsåtgärder på alla typer av elektromekaniska maskiner. 
Arbetet bedrivs förutom i den egna moderna anläggningen som ute i våra kunders 
anläggningar.

Rörick är ISO certifierade i kvalité och miljö. Vi har kunskap och följer 
REACH-lagstiftningen.

Items.Name: Roxia Automation Oy
Items.Description:
SOLUTIONS FOR PROCESS AND INDUSTRIAL AUTOMATION

Polar-Automaatio Oy is a high-tech service provider specialised in industry 
electrification and automation.

With our 30-year experience and broad process and system expertise we deliver 
turnkey solutions for automation and electrification, as well as design and 
implement systems from preliminary plans to implementation. In addition to 
turnkey deliveries, we provide design, assembly, connection and testing of 
systems, control consoles and control housings, among others.

Our staff consists of an experienced and skilled group of engineers. We have 
access to modern facilities and planning tools for electronic documentation.

We supply electrical and automation systems for industries worldwide. We are 
able to provide our clients with tailored solutions based on practices proven 
worldwide.

Items.Name: Rysel Servicios De Automatizacion Sociedad Limitada.
Items.Description:
RYSEL Servicios de Automatización es el servicio técnico de RYSEL Automatización y control y además es una plataforma para desarrollar nuevas ideas basadas en las tecnologías que usamos habitualmente en nuestros proyectos, orientándolas al mantenimiento preventivo y correctivo de instalaciones existentes y al desarrollo alternativo de tecnologías de automatización para procesos industriales de pequeño tamaño y enfoque sencillo.

La prestación de servicios asociados a los procesos industriales tal cual nos han sido demandados con el paso de los años ha adquirido una importancia suficiente como para ser tratados aparte, con sus necesidades específicas.

Por otro lado, las empresas con procesos industriales sencillos no tienen por qué invertir grandes cantidades de dinero para disponer de servicios sofisticados. Una propuesta  simple de bajo coste enfocada adecuadamente es más que suficiente para cubrir las necesidades básicas sin renunciar a posteriores evoluciones.

Items.Name: S.C.A.N. d.o.o.
Items.Description:
SCAN renders instrumentation and automation system integration services for 
various industries.

Beside basic activities which include system engineering support, designing, 
equipment delivery, PLC, DCS, HMI and SCADA systems programming, SCAN provides 
full customer support and training, as well as instrumentation and control 
systems maintenance.

Great experience in system integration, well-trained engineers, sophisticated 
technologies applied and partnership with some of the world's top vendors are 
the guaranty for providing high quality solutions to our customers. Aiming for 
constant improvement, SCAN has established and applies the quality management 
system based on requirements of the ISO 9001:2000 international standard.

Items.Description:
At Sankei Eagle, we provide complete turn-key solutions from concept designs to volume manufacturing of products and equipment for our clients. We strive to understand the customer requirements clearly and recommend the best possible solutions which are cost effective and efficient.

Our expertise are in Material Handling, Robotic Arms, Vision Applications, Process Technologies like screw fastening, welding, soldering, riveting and dispensing, and more.

Items.Name: Scaligera Packaging S.r.l.
Items.Description:
Scaligera Packaging has been manufacturing sleeve application and palletizing systems and unscrumbler machine for a wide variety of products as bottles, cans, plastic bottles, jars, pots, tubs, packets, drinks’ cans, tin cans, bags, heatshrunk, packs, bundles, cases and anything else that can be packed inside boxes and trays in Chemical, Food, Beverage, Cosmetics and Pharma sectors.


Our strong point is without a doubt the research that reveals itself in the construction of machines according to clients’ requirements, using tested technical solutions. Our technical team is made up of designers, qualified technicians, mechanics and electricians, each one with a clearly defined role in order to guarantee the high quality and efficiency of his or her work.


The result is the creation of systems which are outstanding in their positive reliability and practicality of use, and because they deliver the performance promised. The customer service is always active. Contact the internal marketing office for some of our many references. ***

Items.Name: Schwarz & Graf Elektrotechnik GmbH
Items.Description:
Die Firma Schwarz & Graf Elektrotechnik GmbH, Karlsruhe, versteht sich als ein qualifizierter Dienstleister, der 1996 die Nachfolge des alteingesessenen Unternehmens Würtenberger & Haas angetreten hat.

Werkstattfläche: 800 Quadratmeter

Mitarbeiter: 42

Service-Fahrzeuge: 8


Dienstleistungspalette

Transformatorenstationen

 elektrotechnische und mechanische Montagen

und Ersatzteilen

Items.Name: Scott Automation & Robotics Pty Ltd
Items.Description:
Scott Automation + Robotics (SCOTT) designs, builds and integrates automated 
manufacturing and industrial solutions, incorporating advanced robotics across 
a wide range of industries, providing companies with a competitive edge 
enabling them to compete successfully both locally and internationally.  
Customised to the client’s specific requirements, your turnkey robotic solution 
is designed in SCOTT’s state-of-the-art facilities, where extensive system 
trials in a dedicated robotic workshop are conducted prior to installation and 
commissioning on-site, ensuring minimal disruption to your production line.

SCOTT has decades of experience, particularly in the following industries:- 
Food Production, Brewing and Beverages, Packaging, Pharmaceutical, Plastics, 
Meat Industries, Poultry, Mining.
 
SCOTT are a leading designer and manufacturer of complete industrial automation 
and robotic solutions servicing large and small scale production-critical 
companies seeking the competitive edge that high-tech automation and robotics 
provide. THEIR PURPOSE: To be the respected and innovative industrial 
automation leader for production critical industries.
 
SCOTT are experts in providing total end-of-line automation and robotic 
solutions. They offer a complete service, from design, manufacture and project 
management through to implementation and on-going 24 hour support.

Their services include technical expertise in world-leading hardware, 
programming, systems integration, installation, consulting, fault-finding and 
24-hour support. SCOTT’s network comprises a highly specialised team of 
dedicated personnel serving industrial companies with expertise in a wide range 
of leading automation and robotics products.

Integral to SCOTT’s overall long-term growth strategy is the incorporation of a 
broad range of innovative new solutions and services including a dedicated team 
of both automation and robotic sales and engineering professionals and 
strengthening of supplier channels. SCOTT is an award winning company dedicated 
to servicing the specific needs of production-critical companies with 
world-class automation and robotic solutions.

Items.Name: Sentridge Ltd
Items.Description:
We are a successful business specialising in the sale, support and distribution of automation and control products used in the industry today from some of the world's leading manufacturers. Our customers include processing plants, factories large and small, machine builders, utility companies and panel builders.
Sentridge Control are amongst the largest supplier of ABB Inverter drives in the UK. We have many years of experience in specifying and supplying the ABB range of inverter drives. Working in partnership with ABB we can offer your company a complete quality service when it comes to inverter drives.

Items.Name: Sermatech Oy
Items.Description:
First-rate plans and designs benefits your business also in the future

An investment into proper engineering of your project pays back as a 
functioning equipment, smooth commissioning project, and as more efficient 
production. From our broad selection of engineering services you can mix and 
match to create your own project, from the simplest one to a full-fledged 
overall solution. The added value comes specially from us mastering the entire 
supply chain from the very first solution, to rationalization and organizing of 
your production, to development and installation of new machinery and to 
training your staff. We will take care of handling the entire project and will 
deliver a turnkey solution for you, even if the job is a more difficult one.

Our specialities include:
Assembly methods
Material processing (e.g. of metals, wood and plastics)
Robotics and automated handling
Control systems and machine vision

Items.Name: Shanghai Jingxu Automatic Equipment Co Ltd
Items.Description:
Founded in December 2018, the Shanghai Jingxu Automation Equipment Co., Ltd. has been committed to the sales and service of valve positioners and electric actuators for ABB Group in the past decade. Shanghai Jingxu undertakes the design, installation, commissioning and technical services of automation control system for the power and petrochemical sectors based on customer needs.
Our main products include ABB Germany imported TZID-C and EDP300 series intelligent valve positioners, ABB US imported LP/UP pneumatic actuators, and ABB Germany imported Contract electric actuators.
We adhere to the business philosophy of “integrity, specialty, responsibility, innovation” and have established long-term cooperation with many domestic valve companies. We are committed to offer quality brand products, preferential prices, fast delivery to end users from the sectors of electric power, petrochemical engineering, metallurgy, papermaking, food and beverage and more. Our professional technical team stands ready for on-site solutions and services catering to your practical needs.

Items.Name: Shanghai Songsheng Robotic System Co Ltd
Shanghai WinTech Instrument Co Ltd
Items.Description:
WinTech (Shanghai) Co., Ltd., located at the Shanghai Baoshan Industrial Park, focuses on providing research, development, manufacture and services on on-site measurement instruments.
Wintech owns a manufacturing plant and the majority of staff come from famous instrument enterprises at home and abroad. Wintech masters independent key sensor technologies and signal processing technologies, and can provide temperature transmitters, thermocouples, thermal resistances, heat shrink tubes, bimetal thermometers, pressure gauges, pressure transmitters, etc. We cooperate closely with clients to develop all-around solutions in accordance to high-quality measurement components and ultimately provide clients with perfectly integrated solutions on process application.
As a strategic partner of ABB, WinTech is a full agent for temperature, pressure, flow, materials level and analysis instruments of ABB. The company can provide technical consultation, technical solutions and post-sale services for ABB instruments.

Items.Name: Shenzhen Qianhai Ruiji Technology Co Ltd
SHL AG
Items.Description:
The technology company SHL AG was founded in 1989 by the partners Seelmann, Häring and Lehr (SHL) to supply the market with highly automated, robot-assisted grinding, polishing and deburring systems. To date, the company has developed into a process- and solution-oriented robot systems house, with 100 highly qualified employees working passionately every day to provide customers not only with solutions for today's requirements, but also for the requirements of tomorrow.


At its Boettingen site in southern Germany, SHL is involved in the analysis, consultation, project planning, design, manufacture, programming, commissioning and after-sales service of robotic systems and equipment for economical grinding, polishing, deburring and finishing processes,

polishing, deburring, brushing and milling as well as for a wide variety of handling tasks. 


To date, more than 3.500 robotic grinding/sanding, polishing and deburring systems have been realized worldwide. Of course, always with one goal in mind - THE PERFECT SURFACE.
